name: Slogo: The Five PS4s
description:
This isnt a serious game! Its actually pretty bad

This was made only for fun and to try new things with networking,

if you want to try a serious game, check my other games at https://acquah.itch.io/ :)

Hi, my name is Alex, and this is my official second game on this platform. This time i tried something less serious and time consuming, but creating it was just as fun as the first game :) . You can play it online with friends and the main goal is to collect 5 ps4s. Why? well.. you will not understand anyways.. Graphics are ps1 style and the gameplay is slender-like. My only advice is to stay on the road and... remember that... you are not alone

The game was made in unity, i havent included any screenshot to avoid spoilers
hope you'll have fun playing it :)
